content: NEW YORK  July 13 A shareholder of Arconic Inc has filed a proposed class-action lawsuit accusing the company of defrauding shareholders in connection with its having supplied cladding panels used at Grenfell Tower  the London high-rise where dozens of people died last month in a fatal fire.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Arconic is sued in U.S. over fatal London tower fire

content: July 13 Arconic shareholder files securities fraud lawsuit against company over fatal grenfell tower fire in london -- u.s. Court filing LAWSUIT FILED BY MICHAEL BRAVE IN MANHATTAN FEDERAL COURT AGAINST ARCONIC  ITS FORMER CEO KLAUS KLEINFELD  AND CFO KENNETH GIACOBBE PLAINTIFF ALLEGES THAT ARCONIC MADE FALSE AND MISLEADING STATEMENTS  OR FAILED TO TIMELY DISCLOSE MATTERS  RELATED TO THE FIRE PLAINTIFF SAYS ARCONIC'S CONDUCT SIGNIFICANTLY INCREASED THE RISK OF PROPERTY DAMAGE RELATED
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Arconic is sued in U.S. over fatal fire in London's Grenfell Tower

content: NEW YORK Arconic Inc said on Monday it will stop global sales of plastic-filled aluminum cladding panels for use in high-rise buildings after a fire in London's Grenfell Tower  which used those Arconic panels  killed at least 79 people.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Arconic ends sales of panels used at Grenfell Tower for high-rises

content: NEW YORK  June 26 Arconic Inc said on Monday it will stop global sales of plastic-filled aluminum cladding panels for use in high-rise buildings after a fire in London's Grenfell Tower  which used those Arconic panels  killed at least 79 people.
name: Arconic Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Arconic ends sales of panels used at Grenfell Tower for high-rises

content: LONDON Six emails sent by and to an Arconic Inc  sales manager raise questions about why the company supplied combustible cladding to a distributor for use at Grenfell Tower  despite publicly warning such panels were a fire risk for tall buildings.    The emails  dating from 2014 and seen by Reuters  were between Deborah French  Arconic's UK sales manager  and executives at the contractors involved in the bidding process for the refurbishment contract at Grenfell Tower
name: Arconic Inc
title: Arconic knowingly supplied flammable panels for use in tower: emails

content: LONDON  June 24 Six emails sent by and to an Arconic Inc sales manager raise questions about why the company supplied combustible cladding to a distributor for use at Grenfell Tower  despite publicly warning such panels were a fire risk for tall buildings.
name: Arconic Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Arconic knowingly supplied flammable panels for use in tower -emails

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  April 21 (Fitch) Elliott Management's proxy battle with Arconic  Inc.  the parts manufacturer formed from the 2016 breakup of Alcoa  Inc.  could evolve into one of the most notable examples of shareholder activism this year  according to Fitch Ratings. U.S. corporations have become increasingly inclined to enter into amicable settlements with dissident investors in lieu of drawn-out proxy battles due to the time and costs invo
name: Arconic Inc
title: Fitch: Arconic/Elliot Proxy Battle Underscores Activism Trend

content: April 17 Arconic Inc said on Monday Chief Executive Klaus Kleinfeld resigned after the U.S. specialty metals maker found he sent a letter in "poor judgment" to Elliott Management  with whom it is embroiled in a proxy war and which used the chance to again criticize the company's board.
name: Arconic Inc
title: CORRECTED-UPDATE 4-Arconic CEO quits over letter sent in "poor judgment" to Elliott (April 17)

content: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Arconic's board can at least thank Klaus Kleinfeld for a brief reprieve. The chairman and chief executive of the Alcoa spinoff which makes specialty parts for cars and airplanes was shown the door for inappropriately contacting an activist shareholder. That saves Arconic's directors from having to fire him. But they will still have to answer for why they didn't do that long ago.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Arconic CEO's foolishness saves its board  for now

title: PRESS DIGEST - Wall Street Journal - Feb 7

content: * Elliott Associates  L.P. reports open market purchase of 24 000 shares of Arconic Inc's common stock at $25.8813 per share on Feb 6- SEC Filing  Source text: [http://bit.ly/2kLWsTW] Further company coverage:
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Elliott Associates LP reports open market purchase of 24 000 shares of Arconic's common stock at $25.88 per share on Feb 6- SEC Filing

content: A large Arconic Inc.  shareholder said on Monday it supports the effort by hedge fund Elliott Management to shake-up the company's board and urged the firm to avoid a proxy fight.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Arconic shareholder throws support behind Elliott's directors

content: Feb 6 A large Arconic Inc. shareholder said on Monday it supports the effort by hedge fund Elliott Management to shake-up the company's board and urged the firm to avoid a proxy fight.
name: Arconic Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Arconic shareholder throws support behind Elliott's directors

content: NEW YORK Arconic Inc  Chief Executive Officer Klaus Kleinfeld  under pressure from hedge fund Elliott Management  on Wednesday defended the metal maker's performance since spinning off from aluminum producer Alcoa Corp .
name: Arconic Inc
title: Arconic digs in heels against Elliott as proxy fight begins

content: * Arconic - independent directors of co "reinforced unanimous support" of co's strategic direction under continued leadership of chairman  CEO Kleinfeld  Source text for Eikon: (http://bit.ly/2kdhzLV) Further company coverage:
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Arconic says directors "reinforced unanimous support" of co's strategic direction under CEO Kleinfeld

content: NEW YORK  Feb 1 Arconic Inc Chief Executive Officer Klaus Kleinfeld  under pressure from hedge fund Elliott Management  on Wednesday defended the metal maker's performance since spinning off from aluminum producer Alcoa Corp .
name: Arconic Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Arconic digs in heels against Elliott as proxy fight begins

content: Some of Arconic Inc's biggest shareholders are pressing the company to remove Chief Executive Klaus Kleinfeld  the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Investors urge Arconic to oust CEO Klaus Kleinfeld: WSJ

content: CHICAGO Activist investor Elliott Management Corp on Tuesday launched a proxy fight against Arconic Inc   which makes engineered metal parts for the aerospace  automotive and other industries  campaigning for the ouster of the company's chief executive and saying it had a plan to boost the company's performance.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Elliott starts proxy fight with Arconic as it posts fourth-quarter loss

content: * Elliott Associates LP reports purchase of 256 000 shares of Arconic Inc's common stock between Jan 25-27 - SEC filing  Source text: (http://bit.ly/2kbomsn) Further company coverage:
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Elliott Associates buys 256 000 shares of Arconic's common stock between Jan 25-27

content: NEW YORK  Feb 1 Arconic Inc Chief Executive Officer Klaus Kleinfeld  under pressure from hedge fund Elliott Management  on Wednesday defended the metal maker's performance since spinning off from aluminum producer Alcoa Corp AA.N>.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Arconic CEO defends performance as Elliott ramps up pressure

content: Jan 30 Some of Arconic Inc's biggest shareholders are pressing the company to remove Chief Executive Klaus Kleinfeld  the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Arconic Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Investors urge Arconic to oust CEO Klaus Kleinfeld -WSJ

content: NEW YORK Elliott Management launched a proxy fight against metals maker Arconic Inc.  nominating five directors on Tuesday to serve on the company's board.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Elliott nominates 5 directors in Arconic proxy fight

content: * Elliott International LP reports purchase of 544 000 shares of Arconic Inc's common stock between Jan 25-27 - SEC filing  Source text: (http://bit.ly/2kcxduf) Further company coverage:
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Elliott International buys 544 000 shares of Arconic's common stock between Jan 25-27

content: * Says confirmed that its board of directors unanimously supports Klaus Kleinfeld as company's chairman and chief executive officer  Source text for Eikon:  Further company coverage:
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Arconic confirms its board "unanimously supports" Klaus Kleinfeld as chairman and CEO

content: * Elliott Associates and affiliates have combined economic exposure in Arconic Inc of about 11.9 percent of shares of common stock as of Jan. 23
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Elliott associates have combined economic exposure in Arconic Inc of about 11.9 pct of shares

content: Jan 30 Arconic Inc said on Monday that Chief Executive Officer Klaus Kleinfeld "has the unanimous support" of its board  responding to a report of pressure from some of the Alcoa Corp spinoff's biggest shareholders for a leadership change.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Arconic says CEO Kleinfeld 'has unanimous support' of its board

content: NEW YORK  Jan 31 Elliott Management launched a proxy fight against metals maker Arconic Inc.  nominating five directors on Tuesday to serve on the company's board.
name: Arconic Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Elliott nominates 5 directors in Arconic proxy fight

content: CHICAGO  Jan 31 Activist investor Elliott Management Corp on Tuesday launched a proxy fight against Arconic Inc  which makes engineered metal parts for the aerospace  automotive and other industries  campaigning for the ouster of the company's chief executive and saying it had a plan to boost the company's performance.
name: Arconic Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Elliott starts proxy fight with Arconic as it posts Q4 loss

content: * Matthew E. Garth joins Minerals Technologies Inc as chief financial officer
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Matthew Garth joins Minerals Technologies as CFO

content: SYDNEY  Jan 20 AGL Energy Ltd said on Friday it has agreed to supply electricity to an Australian smelter owned Alcoa that was hit by blackouts late last year.
name: Arconic Inc
title: AGL and Alcoa agree supply deal as part of smelter rescue package

content: SYDNEY Plans to provide government support to keep open a 30-year-old aluminum smelter in Australia owned by Alcoa  have made "progress"  parties involved in talks said on Monday without giving details.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Australia government  Alcoa say making progress in aluminum smelter talks

content: Jan 30 Arconic Inc's several biggest shareholders are pressing the company to remove Chief Executive Klaus Kleinfeld  the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Several investors urge Arconic to oust CEO Klaus Kleinfeld - WSJ

content: NEW YORK  Jan 31 Arconic Inc. is facing a proxy fight from its largest shareholder after Elliott Management on Tuesday nominated five directors to serve on the company's board.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Elliott nominates 5 directors in proxy fight aimed at Arconic

content: * Several of Arconic's largest investors are pressing co to oust CEO Klaus Kleinfeld after Alcoa separation - CNBC  citing DJ   Source text: http://bit.ly/2jLaLas
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Several of Arconic's largest investors are pressing co to oust CEO Kleinfeld after Alcoa separation - CNBC

content: * Q4 adjusted earnings per share $0.12 from continuing operations excluding items
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Arconic reports Q4 loss per share $2.88

content: CHICAGO  Jan 31 Arconic Inc <ARNC.N  which makes engineered metal parts for the aerospace  automotive and other industries  on Tuesday reported a quarterly net loss that was driven by charges related to the company's separation from Alcoa Corp last November.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Arconic posts loss driven by separation costs from Alcoa

content: * Negotiations to continue through December   (Recasts with other producers' offers and buyers' comments)
name: Arconic Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Aluminium producers seek Q1 premium of $95-$110/T from Japanese buyers -sources

content: TOKYO  Nov 25 A major aluminium producer has offered Japanese buyers a premium of $95 per tonne for primary metal shipments in the January to March period  up 27 percent from the previous quarter  four sources directly involved in pricing talks said on Friday.
name: Arconic Inc
title: Aluminium producer seeks Q1 premium of $95/T from Japan buyers -sources

content: * Elliott  Elliott International and EICA - Collectively have combined economic exposure in Arconic Inc of about 10 percent of the shares of common stock outstanding
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Elliott and affiliates raise combined economic exposure in Arconic to about 10 pct

content: * Arconic inc - announced a multi-year contract with airbus valued at approximately $1 billion
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Arconic wins $1 bln multi-year contract with Airbus

content: Nov 4 Elliott Associates lp Reports Combined Economic Exposure Of 9.0 Pct In Arconic Inc -
name: Arconic Inc
title: BRIEF-Elliott Associates reports combined economic exposure of 9 pct in Arconic
